mapper.update: update s_b_call_main set farm_id = #{farmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, temp_id = #{tempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_result = #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, succ_time = #{succTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bak1 = #{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2 = #{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, farm_id, house_id, temp_id, call_result, succ_time, create_time, modify_time, bak1, bak2 from s_b_call_main where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, farm_id, house_id, temp_id, call_result, succ_time, create_time, modify_time, bak1, bak2 from s_b_call_main
select id, farm_id, house_id, temp_id, call_result, succ_time, create_time, modify_time, bak1, bak2 from s_b_call_main where call_result in('01','02','04')
